TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit OutputCacheProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase

Docs.summary: Serves as a base class that contains abstract methods for implementing an output-cache provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks All output-cache providers must implement the abstract methods in the <xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider> class.

block.para:
When you inherit from , you must override the following members:
-
-
-
-

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object Add (string key, object entry, DateTime utcExpiry);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Add(string key, object entry, valuetype System.DateTime utcExpiry) cil managed

Docs.param: The content to add to the output cache.
The time and date on which the cached entry expires.
Docs.summary: Inserts the specified entry into the output cache.
Docs.returns: A reference to the specified provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If there is already a value in the cache for the specified key, the provider must return that value. The provider must not store the data passed by using the <xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider.Add%2A> method parameters. The <xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider.Add%2A> method stores the data if it is not already in the cache. If the data is in the cache, the <xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider.Add%2A> method returns it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Get(string key) cil managed

Docs.param: A unique identifier for a cached entry in the output cache.
Docs.summary: Returns a reference to the specified entry in the output cache.
Docs.returns: The value that identifies the specified entry in the cache, or if the specified entry is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(string key) cil managed

Docs.param: The unique identifier for the entry to remove from the output cache.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified entry from the output cache.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Set (string key, object entry, DateTime utcExpiry);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Set(string key, object entry, valuetype System.DateTime utcExpiry) cil managed

Docs.param: The content to add to the output cache.
The time and date on which the cached entry expires.
Docs.summary: Inserts the specified entry into the output cache, overwriting the entry if it is already cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The expiration date specified in `utcExpiry` is always an absolute expiration date.
